text: Shree Krishna Shrestha (April 19, 1967 â€“ August 10, 2014) () was a Nepalese actor. He achieved nation wide recognition with roles in movies like Maiti and Afno Manche. Shrestha died in New Delhi, India from pneumonia, aged 44.eeuropenepal Staff (11 August) "Actor Shrestha's body to arrived in Kathmandu today," Europenepal.Net (Kathmandu) captured at 11 August 7:43 am.Actor, Shreekrishna, dies at 44 He is survived by his wife Sweta Khadka, for whom he was married to for only a month. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in India Category:Nepalese movie actors Category:Actors from Kathmandu
